titleStmt.title: The Armies dutie; or, Faithfull advice to the souldiers: given in two letters written by severall honest men, unto the Lord Fleetwood Lieutenant-Generall of the Armie, and now published for the instruction of the whole Armie, and the good people of this Common-wealth.
titleStmt.author: H. M.
Fleetwood, Charles, d. 1692.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold in Popes-head Alley, S. Pauls Church-yard, and Westminster Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
